oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Kye Fleming & Dennis L. Morgan Interview by John Lomax III.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is an interview of Kye Fleming & Dennis L. Morgan. The interview takes place on 12-9-80.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kye Fleming; Dennis L. Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side One - (0:01) - John Lomax introduction and asks Kye Fleming about her biographical background. (1:25) -- Kye Fleming describes her management in New York. Kye describes meeting Jerry Scheff. (2:20) -- Kye first went with Jerry Scheff to Combine, then signed as a writer for Tom Collins. (3:20) -- Dennis L. Morgan describes his origins and musical roots. (5:00) -- Dennis L. Morgan describes meeting David Conrad and Charley Pride. (5:50) -- John Lomax asks what got Kye Fleming and Dennis L. Morgan into songwriting. Dennis L. Morgan cites John Lennon as a major influence. (8:32) -- Kye Fleming explains the benefits of living in Nashville, TN. (10:53) -- John Lomax asks Kye Fleming and Dennis L. Morgan about their writing process. (12:20) -- Kye Fleming discusses their current songwriting endeavors. (14:30) -- Dennis L. Morgan and Kye Fleming describe their love for 'hard' country. (16:07) -- John Lomax asks Dennis L. Morgan and Kye Fleming about their daily approach. (17:40) -- John Lomax asks about "Smoky Mountain Rain." (18:30) -- Kye Fleming mentions "Appalachian Rain," an earlier version of "Smoky Mountain Rain" requested by Tom Collins. (21:01) -- John Lomax asks how Kye Fleming and Dennis L. Morgan deal with writer's block. (23:26) -- Dennis L. Morgan and Kye Fleming discuss how being too critical of their own ideas can destroy a song. (24:00) -- John Lomax asks Kye Fleming about when she first recorded a song. (24:55) -- Dennis L. Morgan describes the first song he got recorded and jingle writing. (26:26) -- John Lomax asks whether being a man and woman gives Kye and Dennis an advantage over other combinations of songwriters or songwriters on their own. (28:50) -- John Lomax asks Kye and Dennis how they first met each other.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fleming, Kye; Morgan, Dennis, 1952-;
